title: Problem in the training of Unsupervised Learning for Fast Probabilistic Diffeomorphic Registration.Dice drop.
body:
**Task** (what are you trying to do/register?)
MICCAI 2018.scan-to-scan.
[please describe task here]
The size of my data is 96*112*96. Using standard processing, using freesufer affine alignment and normalizing to 0-1.
**What have you tried**
I used a variety of hyperparameter settings during training.mse: (lambda=0.01,lambda_weight=10,image_sigma=0.02).NCC(lambda=1,lambda_weight=25,image_sigma=0.02) and so on.use_prob=True.int_step=7.
Please describe specifics of your approach // use of `vxm`
I am using the latest version of the code downloaded from the official website.
**Details of experiments**
I used a variety of hyperparameter settings during training. But Dice always drops to around 0.41. I don't know where the problem.
Please carefully specify details about your experiments. If you are training, when what is the setup? What loss are you using? What does the convergence look like? If you are registering, please show example inputs and outputs. etc.
